Not to steal J.B.'s flame, but I think this is what
you may be looking for:<BR>

<snip content="example" />

I assume you didn't mean "flame" in the sense it's
usually used on newsgroups. :)

As for your example, I'm not sure how it gives the
test case objects access to data created by setUp()
and tearDown(). If the one-time setup does something
in an external data source, like a database, then all
is well; but if it changes data inside the JVM, how do
the test cases gain access to that data? Class-level
variables, I guess.

:)

JBR.
